definition: Chuk Yuen (place in Hong Kong)
bamboo/CL:棵[ke1],支[zhi1],根[gen1]/Kangxi radical 118
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
surname Yuan

sentences.english: The process design for reconstruction and expansion engineering of Hunan Shizhuyuan Bismuth Smelter is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹湖南柿竹園公司鉍冶煉改擴建的工藝設計。

sentences.english: I bought some souvenirs in Bamboo Garden for my best friend.
sentences.chinese: 我在萬竹園裏買了一些紀念品給我最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Chinese Bamboo garden is also a part of the bamboo culture.
sentences.chinese: 中國式竹園也是竹文化的一部分。

sentences.english: If you want to Chuk Yuen Estate to buy lychees, the villagers will take you to lychee Island.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想去竹園村購荔枝，村民就會帶你來到荔枝島。

sentences.english: ATS48(JN4092) was seen here at Queensway heading for Chuk Yuen Estate in Kowloon.
sentences.chinese: 這天ATS48正取道金鐘道，向九龍竹園村進發。

sentences.english: The dewatering feature of the fluorite concentrate in Shizhuyuan Mine has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了柿竹園螢石精礦的脫水特性。

a thousand pounds hangs by a thread (idiom)/imminent peril/a matter of life or death

frequently/often/usually/regularly
fence/paling
Huwei town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
